description:
Simeon and Kenshiro face off in Erika`s presence. The battle between the Divine Fist of the North Star and Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin fist has finally begun. Taking advantage of the chaos, Himuka leads Erika through the hallways of the underground palace. He demands to know the location of the jewels. What is Himuka`s true goal...?! Simeon and Kenshiro engage in a fierce battle. As they exchange blows, Kenshiro realizes Simeon`s true nature and utters a requiem for him. "Your style hasn`t made any progress since long ago, like a snake that can`t shed its skin..."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Setting Sun of the Nahash People
